# ctx

Context against which to authenticate close.

## Fields

- **vp**: File to close.
- **fflag**: FREAD and/or FWRITE; in the case of a file opened with open(2), fflag corresponds to how the file was opened.

items.description: FREAD and/or FWRITE; in the case of a file opened with open(2), fflag corresponds to how the file was opened.
